name: Samantha Lemley
title: Customer Service Professional
summary: High-energy “people person” seeking to create a positive impact through customer service.

employment.summary: Fulfilled delivery and customer service roles while maintaining customer satisfaction ratings of 4.9+/5.
highlights: Handled app issues, traffic, and service demands

employment.summary: Delivered excellent customer experience in a high-volume restaurant.
highlights: Used POS to take and manage orders
Won 2020 Gift Card Contest for top holiday sales

employment.summary: Led branding and sales strategy for low-carb specialty food products.
highlights: Created brand identity and marketing materials
Organized KetoLuxe and Low Carb Revolution events
Sold on Amazon, Etsy, Shopify, Market Wagon, and expos
Awarded for 'Healthcare Heroes Easter Meals' campaign

awards.title: Indiana Culinary Heroes Award
awards.summary: For creating 'Healthcare Heroes Easter Meals' to feed over 700 frontline workers

awards.title: Gift Card Contest Winner
awards.summary: Highest sales during winter holiday season

grants: Co-recipient of James Beard Foundation Rhone Rangers grant
